    • 方法详细资料

      • segmentCount

        public OhcCacheOptions<K,V> segmentCount(int segmentCount)
        Sets cache number of segments. default 2 * number of CPUs (java.lang.Runtime.availableProcessors()).
        参数:
        segmentCount - cache number of segments
        返回:
        OhcCacheOptions instance

      • getSegmentCount

        public Integer getSegmentCount()

      • hashTableSize

        public OhcCacheOptions<K,V> hashTableSize(int hashTableSize)
        Sets cache initial size of each segment's hash table. default 8192.
        参数:
        hashTableSize - cache initial size of each segment's hash table
        返回:
        OhcCacheOptions instance

      • getHashTableSize

        public Integer getHashTableSize()

      • capacity

        public OhcCacheOptions<K,V> capacity(long capacity)
        Sets cache capacity of the cache in bytes. default 16 MB * number of CPUs (java.lang.Runtime.availableProcessors()), minimum 64 MB.
        参数:
        capacity - cache capacity of the cache in bytes
        返回:
        OhcCacheOptions instance

      • getCapacity

        public Long getCapacity()

      • chunkSize

        public OhcCacheOptions<K,V> chunkSize(int chunkSize)
        Sets cache chunk size. If set and positive, the chunked implementation will be used and each segment will be divided into this amount of chunks. default 0. Then linked implementation will be used.
        参数:
        chunkSize - cache chunk size.
        返回:
        OhcCacheOptions instance

      • getChunkSize

        public Integer getChunkSize()

      • keySerializer

        public OhcCacheOptions<K,V> keySerializer(org.caffinitas.ohc.CacheSerializer<K> keySerializer)
        Sets cache keys serializer implementation. Must be configured. default ProtostuffCacheSerializer
        参数:
        keySerializer - cache keys serializer implementation.
        返回:
        OhcCacheOptions instance

      • getKeySerializer

        public org.caffinitas.ohc.CacheSerializer<K> getKeySerializer()

      • valueSerializer

        public OhcCacheOptions<K,V> valueSerializer(org.caffinitas.ohc.CacheSerializer<V> valueSerializer)
        Sets cache values serializer implementation. Must be configured. default ProtostuffCacheSerializer
        参数:
        valueSerializer - cache values serializer implementation.
        返回:
        OhcCacheOptions instance

      • getValueSerializer

        public org.caffinitas.ohc.CacheSerializer<V> getValueSerializer()

      • loadFactor

        public OhcCacheOptions<K,V> loadFactor(Float loadFactor)
        Sets cache hash table load factor which determines when rehashing occurs. default .75f.
        参数:
        loadFactor - cache hash table load factor.
        返回:
        OhcCacheOptions instance

      • getLoadFactor

        public Float getLoadFactor()

      • fixedKeySize

        public OhcCacheOptions<K,V> fixedKeySize(Integer fixedKeySize)
        If set and positive, the chunked implementation with fixed sized entries will be used. The parameter chunkSize must be set for fixed-sized entries. default 0. Then linked implementation will be used, if chunkSize is also 0
        参数:
        fixedKeySize - cache key fixed sized.
        返回:
        OhcCacheOptions instance

      • getFixedKeySize

        public Integer getFixedKeySize()

      • fixedValueSize

        public OhcCacheOptions<K,V> fixedValueSize(Integer fixedValueSize)
        If set and positive, the chunked implementation with fixed sized entries will be used. The parameter chunkSize must be set for fixed-sized entries. default 0. Then linked implementation will be used, if chunkSize is also 0
        参数:
        fixedValueSize - cache value fixed sized.
        返回:
        OhcCacheOptions instance

      • getFixedValueSize

        public Integer getFixedValueSize()

      • maxEntrySize

        public OhcCacheOptions<K,V> maxEntrySize(Long maxEntrySize)
        Sets cache maximum size of a hash entry (including header, serialized key + serialized value) defaults to capacity divided by number of segments.
        参数:
        maxEntrySize - cache maximum size (including header, serialized key + serialized value).
        返回:
        OhcCacheOptions instance

      • getMaxEntrySize

        public Long getMaxEntrySize()

      • throwOOME

        public OhcCacheOptions<K,V> throwOOME(Boolean throwOOME)
        Sets cache whether throw OutOfMemoryError if off-heap allocation fails. default false.
        参数:
        throwOOME - cache throw OutOfMemoryError.
        返回:
        OhcCacheOptions instance

      • getThrowOOME

        public Boolean getThrowOOME()

      • hashAlgorighm

        public OhcCacheOptions<K,V> hashAlgorighm(org.caffinitas.ohc.HashAlgorithm hashAlgorighm)
        Sets cache internal hash algorithm. Valid options are: XX for xx-hash, MURMUR3 or CRC32 Note: this setting does may only help to improve throughput in rare situations - i.e. if the key is very long and you've proven that it really improves performace default MURMUR3.
        参数:
        hashAlgorighm - cache internal hash algorithm.
        返回:
        OhcCacheOptions instance

      • getHashAlgorighm

        public org.caffinitas.ohc.HashAlgorithm getHashAlgorighm()

      • unlocked

        public OhcCacheOptions<K,V> unlocked(Boolean unlocked)
        Sets cache internal unlocked. If set to true, implementations will not perform any locking. The calling code has to take care of synchronized access. In order to create an instance for a thread-per-core implementation, set segmentCount=1, too. default false.
        参数:
        unlocked - cache internal unlocked.
        返回:
        OhcCacheOptions instance

      • getUnlocked

        public Boolean getUnlocked()

      • defaultTTLmillis

        public OhcCacheOptions<K,V> defaultTTLmillis(Long defaultTTLmillis)
        Sets cache TTL in milliseconds. If set to a value > 0, implementations supporting TTLs will tag all entries with the given TTL in milliseconds. default 60000.
        参数:
        defaultTTLmillis - cache TTL in milliseconds.
        返回:
        OhcCacheOptions instance

      • getDefaultTTLmillis

        public Long getDefaultTTLmillis()

      • timeouts

        public OhcCacheOptions<K,V> timeouts(Boolean timeouts)
        Sets cache timeouts. default true.
        参数:
        timeouts - cache TTL in milliseconds.
        返回:
        OhcCacheOptions instance

      • getTimeouts

        public Boolean getTimeouts()

      • timeoutsSlots

        public OhcCacheOptions<K,V> timeoutsSlots(Integer timeoutsSlots)
        Sets cache number of timeouts slots for each segment - compare with hashed wheel timer. default 64.
        参数:
        timeoutsSlots - number of timeouts slots for each segment.
        返回:
        OhcCacheOptions instance

      • getTimeoutsSlots

        public Integer getTimeoutsSlots()

      • timeoutsPrecision

        public OhcCacheOptions<K,V> timeoutsPrecision(Integer timeoutsPrecision)
        Sets cache amount of time in milliseconds for each timeouts-slot - compare with hashed wheel timer. default 128.
        参数:
        timeoutsPrecision - amount of time in milliseconds for each timeouts-slot.
        返回:
        OhcCacheOptions instance

      • getTimeoutsPrecision

        public Integer getTimeoutsPrecision()

      • ticker

        public OhcCacheOptions<K,V> ticker(org.caffinitas.ohc.Ticker ticker)
        Indirection for current time - used for unit tests. default default. Default ticker using System.nanoTime() and System.currentTimeMillis()
        参数:
        ticker - current time ticker.
        返回:
        OhcCacheOptions instance

      • getTicker

        public org.caffinitas.ohc.Ticker getTicker()

      • ticker

        public OhcCacheOptions<K,V> ticker(org.caffinitas.ohc.Eviction eviction)
        Choose the eviction algorithm to use. Available are:
        • LRU: Plain LRU - least used entry is subject to eviction
        • W-WinyLFU: Enable use of Window Tiny-LFU. The size of the frequency sketch ("admission filter") is set to the value of hashTableSize. See this article for a description.
        • None: No entries will be evicted - this effectively provides a capacity-bounded off-heap map.
        default W-WinyLFU.
        参数:
        eviction - eviction algorithm.
        返回:
        OhcCacheOptions instance

      • getEviction

        public org.caffinitas.ohc.Eviction getEviction()

      • frequencySketchSize

        public OhcCacheOptions<K,V> frequencySketchSize(Integer frequencySketchSize)
        Size of the frequency sketch used by W-WinyLFU. default hashTableSize.
        参数:
        frequencySketchSize - used by W-WinyLFU.
        返回:
        OhcCacheOptions instance

      • getFrequencySketchSize

        public Integer getFrequencySketchSize()

      • edenSize

        public OhcCacheOptions<K,V> edenSize(Double edenSize)
        Size of the eden generation used by W-WinyLFU relative to a segment's size default 0.2.
        参数:
        edenSize - used by W-WinyLFU.
        返回:
        OhcCacheOptions instance
